name: Banksy
description: Banksy is an anonymous England-based street artist.

name: Shai Dahan
description: Shai Dahan is an American contemporary painter and street artist who works with painting, drawing, illustrations and sculptures. In 2007, Dahan moved to New York City where he participated in street-art projects such as the NYSAT, Underbelly Project, and MOM&POPism
